title: Love Island's India Reynolds attends boohooMAN event with Amber Gill in Paris after Ovie Soko split
text:
She recently broke her silence on her split from Ovie Soko, admitting she hopes her DMs will 'be a bit more full now' as she adjusts to single life.

And India Reynolds appeared to put her 'difficult' break-up behind her as she attended the boohooMAN x Dadju event with her ex Ovie's BFF Amber Gill at the Arab World Institute in Paris on Tuesday evening.

The Love Island star, 28, mixed sporty and sexy as she teamed a thigh-skimming jumper dress from the fashion retailer with a pair of PVC thigh-high boots.

Newly-single: India Reynolds appeared to put her break-up from Ovie Soko behind her as she attended the boohooMAN x Dadju event with her ex's BFF Amber Gill in Paris on Tuesday

Upping the style ante, the model wrapped up in a black teddy bear coat as she posed up a storm at the industry event.

The media personality injected even more glamour into her appearance as she toted her belongings in a textured chain-strap bag by YSL.

Brunette beauty India looked radiant as she complemented her beauty with heavy strokes of make-up and dressed her tresses into glossy waves.

Opting for a slightly more sultry look, Love Island 2019 series winner Amber, 22, stunned in a pink ruched mini-dress, complete with a plunging neckline.

All eyes on her: The Love Island star, 28, mixed sporty and sexy as she teamed a thigh-skimming jumper dress from the fashion retailer with a pair of PVC thigh-high boots

Break-up: She recently broke her silence on her split from footballer Ovie, 28, admitting she hopes her DMs will 'be a bit more full now' as she adjusts to single life (pictured in July)

Suave: Reality star Tommy Fury looked dapper in a grey checked coat, teamed with a white T-shirt and black trousers

Man of the hour: French singer Dadju cut a cool figure in a brown fluffy coat at his fashion event

In good company: The musician, 28, appeared in great spirits as he posed for a snap with boohooMAN CEO's Samir Kamani

The curly-haired bombshell put her best fashion foot forward as she flashed a hint of her white pedicure in her sparkling lace-up heels.

With her glossy mane styled into its natural state, the former beauty technician highlighted her naturally radiant features with pink-toned make-up and rounded off her look with a diamond choker necklace.

Earlier this month, India and basketball player Ovie, 28, shocked fans as news about their split emerged, after four months of dating.

Despite admitting their break-up has been 'difficult', the boohoo model joked she hopes her DMs will be 'a bit more full' now she's single again.

Starry: Model Malika Menard nailed business chic in a leather blazer jacket and matching trousers

Effortlessly stylish: Hunky boxer Lawrence Okolie opted for an all-black look, tied in with a gold pendant necklace

Speaking on the red carpet at the Pride Of Britain Awards at London's Grosvenor House Hotel on Monday night, she said: 'Maybe they'll [DMs] be a bit more full now.

'I feel like I've been dropped back in the ocean. We'll see. I'm lucky, I've got a really close group of girlfriends, they've been really looking after me.'

Speaking about the split, India shared: 'Obviously it's difficult, but any break-up is difficult. It's even more difficult when it's in front of the rest of the world, but I'll be fine.'

The couple hadn't managed to see each other for six weeks in the lead-up to their split, but narrowly avoided a run-in on the red carpet at the ceremony.
